panels.description: The lag between changefeed checkpoint ts and the latest ts of upstream TiDB.

panels.title: Changefeed resolved ts lag

panels.description:
The total number of tables in different replication states.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Table replication state

panels.description: The total number of accepted schedule tasks.

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_scheduler_task_accept{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (changefeed, scheduler, task)

panels.title: Slowest table ID

panels.description:
The state of the slowest table.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Slowest table replication state

go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_other_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_txn_exec_duration_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le,instance, changefeed))

panels.title: Kafka sink write duration percentile

panels.description: Percentiles of sink batch size

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_txn_batch_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_txn_batch_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_txn_batch_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

panels.title: Kafka sink write batch size percentile

panels.description: The number of changed rows that are written to  downstream Kafka producer
panels.title: Kafka sink write rows count/s

panels.description: Percentiles of Kafka sink received data events' size, only track data not smaller than 128k

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_received_row_changed_event_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_received_row_changed_event_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(ticdc_sink_received_row_changed_event_size_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed",instance=~"$ticdc_instance", type="MQ"}[1m])) by (le, instance, changefeed))

panels.title: large data event size (Kafka)

panels.description: The number of bytes send for all topics.
panels.title: batch size

panels.description:
Records/second sent to all topics

value = one-minute moving average of record send rate
panels.title: records send rate

panels.description:
The number of records sent per request for all topics

value = records per request histogram's mean
panels.title: records per request

panels.description: the compression ratio times 100 of record batches for all topics
panels.title: compression ratio

panels.description:
Bytes/second write to brokers

value = one-minute moving average rate of sent bytes

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_outgoing_byte_rate{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: Bytes/second write to brokers

panels.description:
Bytes/second read from different brokers.

value = one-minute moving average rate of all read bytes

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_incoming_byte_rate{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: Bytes/second read from brokers

panels.description:
Requests/second sent to all brokers

value = one-minute moving average rate of events per second

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_request_rate{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: request rate

panels.description:
Responses/second received from all brokers

value = one-minute moving average of response receive rate

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_response_rate{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: response rate

panels.description:
the request size in bytes for all brokers

value = requests histogram's mean

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_request_size{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: request size

panels.description:
the response size in bytes

value = response size histogram's mean

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_response_size{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: response size

panels.description:
the request latency in ms for all brokers

value = request latency histogram's mean

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_request_latency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: the request latency

panels.description:
the current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response

value = the count of inflight requests.

updated each 1s, in a good network environment, this value should be very small.

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_in_flight_requests{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (changefeed, instance, broker)

panels.title: inflight requests
